items.title: Category Object
items.description: A category to group project objects under.

title.title: Category Title
title.description: A human-readable identifier for the category.

id.title: Category Identifier
id.description: A short identifier designed for programs. It should only contain lowercase alphanumeric characters and a - (dash) for replacing spaces.

description.title: Category Description
description.description: A description of the category meant to be provided to the user.

parent.title: Category Parent
parent.description: Makes the current category a subcategory of the category with an id that matches this value.

items.title: Project Object
items.description: An object that holds all the information for a specific project.

title.title: Project Title
title.description: The official title of the project.

category.title: Project Category
category.description: The category or list of categories that the project falls under. If it is a list, the categories should be ordered from most to least relevant/applicable to the project.

description.title: Project Description
description.description: A brief 1 sentence summary of the project.

lang.title: Project Language
lang.description: A three-character ISO 639-2 code representing the primary language of the project, or a list of such codes, with the primary language first.

country.title: Project Country
country.description: The country that the project operates out of or the country the project is designed for (if designed for a specific location). Null if country is unclear/unspecified.

source.title: Project Source
source.description: A URL where the source code to the project can be found.

homepage.title: Project Homepage
homepage.description: The URL for the project's homepage.

itunes.title: Project iTunes Page
itunes.description: The URL for iTunes page for the project's app.

stars.title: Project Stars
stars.description: The number of stars a project has on Github, or null if the project is not a Github project.

tags.title: Project Tags
tags.description: A place to put any metadata for a project. The items can be any type.
